home.title: Hello, I am
home.subtitle: Software Developer
home.description: I create elegant digital experiences and master several programming languages and technologies.

contact.title: Contact me if needed
contact.description: You can contact me at any time. I am available. But I would like to remind you that my startup C-dev is under construction.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: I design and develop websites optimized for all devices. My goal is to provide fast, secure platforms tailored to client needs, using the latest technologies.

uiUxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiUxDesign.description: I create smooth and aesthetic user experiences, focusing on ergonomics and accessibility. Each design is thought to maximize user engagement and satisfaction.

logoDesign.title: Logo Design
logoDesign.description: I design unique and professional logos that reflect your brand's vision and values. The goal: make an impact with a simple, relevant and striking visual.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Development
mobileDevelopment.description: I develop modern, smooth and well-thought Android and iOS applications. My goal is to offer an optimal user experience, with features adapted to real needs.

pokedex.title: React project
pokedex.description: API manipulation (pokeApi) and firebase for the database.

todo.category: My first TODO list in react

startup.title: Project 3

about.title: About
about.description: On this page, you will find everything about me. However, you can contact me via my email or mobile.

experience.title: My experience
experience.description: In this section, you will find a summary of my professional experiences and internships, illustrating the skills I have developed and the projects I have participated in.

education.title: My education
education.description: My educational journey reflects my passion for technology and my commitment to continuous learning. From academic training to online certifications, each step has brought me closer to my professional goals.

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: In this section, you will find all the languages, frameworks and tools I have learned and mastered.
